creator: jeremias@apache.org
text:
Created attachment 24828
Possible fix

Some Type1 fonts appear to specify a default encoding that doesn't match the actual encoding of the glyphs in the AFM file. Add to that the fact that we're currently mapping "AdobeStandardEncoding" to the "StandardEncoding" and suddenly umlauts don't work with some Type 1 fonts. I've attached a patch the will probably fix this but I haven't got time to properly test with all fonts I have so I won't commit this just now.
